files.help:
Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export APP_FOLDER_ABSOLUTE_PATH="$XDG_DATA_HOME"/redisinsight-v2
```

If you do not use the obsolete preview version then just remove the folder. Otherwise export the following environment variables and upgrade to the current version.:

```bash
export APP_FOLDER_ABSOLUTE_PATH="$XDG_DATA_HOME"/redisinsight-v2
```
